00566   std::string otos(Printable n)

00596   template <typename To>
00597   bool stringTo(To& val, const char* str)
00598   {
00599     if (str == 0) { return false; }
00600 
00601     std::stringstream s;
00602     if ((s << str).fail()) { return false; }
00603     if ((s >> val).fail()) { return false; }
00604     return true;
00605   }
